chinese: 医生给病人解释为什么要打针。
english: The doctor explains to the patient why they need an injection.

chinese: 中国人希望医生给他们打针。
english: Chinese people hope the doctor will give them an injection.
The doctor prescribes medicine for the patient.

chinese: 医生每天要给很多病人看病。
english: Doctors have to see many patients every day.
The doctor gives the patient an injection.
